name: Premium Wireless Headphones
description: Experience exceptional audio quality with our premium wireless headphones featuring active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and premium comfort padding. Perfect for music lovers, professionals, and travelers who demand the best in audio technology.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Advanced fitness tracking meets smart technology in this comprehensive health companion. Monitor your heart rate, track workouts, receive notifications, and gain valuable health insights with built-in GPS, sleep tracking, and 7-day battery life.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Simplify your charging routine with this sleek wireless charging pad supporting fast charging for all Qi-enabled devices. Features LED indicators, overcharge protection, and a premium aluminum design that complements any workspace or bedside table.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Powerful 360-degree sound in a compact, waterproof design perfect for any adventure. With 12-hour battery life, IPX7 water resistance, and crystal-clear audio quality, this speaker delivers premium sound wherever life takes you.

name: USB-C Multiport Hub
description: Expand your connectivity with this versatile USB-C hub featuring 4K HDMI output, multiple USB 3.0 ports, SD card reader, and fast charging pass-through. The perfect companion for laptops, tablets, and modern devices requiring multiple connections.
